"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input" import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label" import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from "@/components/ui/select" import { Textarea } from "@/components/ui/textarea" import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from "@/components/ui/tabs" import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge" import { Alert, AlertDescription } from "@/components/ui/alert" import { Trash2, Users, GraduationCap, UserCheck, Settings } from "lucide-react" export default function DepartmentDashboard() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("students") const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [message, setMessage] = useState({ type: "", text: "" }) const [studentForm, setStudentForm] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", usn: "", department: "", semester: "", phoneNumber: "", address: "", }) const [teacherForm, setTeacherForm] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", department: "", designation: "", specialization: "", phoneNumber: "", }) const [adminForm, setAdminForm] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", phoneNumber: "", adminType: "FOOD_CART", }) const departments = [ "COMPUTER SCIENCE", "INFORMATION SCIENCE", "ELECTRONICS", "MECHANICAL", "CIVIL", "ELECTRICAL", "MCA", "MCom", "MBA", "BCA", "BCom", ] const semesters = ["1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "7", "8"] const designations = ["Assistant Professor", "Associate Professor", "Professor", "HOD", "Principal"] const adminTypes = [ { value: "FOOD_CART", label: "Food Cart Management" }, { value: "CANTEEN", label: "Canteen Management" }, { value: "STATIONERY", label: "Stationery Management" }, ] const showMessage = (type, text) => { setMessage({ type, text }) setTimeout(() => setMessage({ type: "", text: "" }), 5000) } const generateId = (type, department) => { const timestamp = Date.now() const random = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000) if (type === "STUDENT") { const deptCode = getDepartmentCode(department) const year = new Date().getFullYear().toString().slice(-2) return `DSCE${deptCode}${year}${random.toString().padStart(4, "0")}` } else if (type === "TEACHER") { const deptCode = getDepartmentCode(department) return `EMP${deptCode}${random.toString().padStart(4, "0")}` } return `${timestamp}${random}` } const getDepartmentCode = (department) => { const codes = { "COMPUTER SCIENCE": "CS", "INFORMATION SCIENCE": "IS", ELECTRONICS: "EC", MECHANICAL: "ME", CIVIL: "CV", ELECTRICAL: "EE", MCA: "MCA", MCom: "MCM", MBA: "MBA", BCA: "BCA", BCom: "BCM", } return codes[department] || "GEN" } const handleStudentSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) setTimeout(() => { try { const newUser = { id: Date.now(), userId: studentForm.usn, email: studentForm.email, firstName: studentForm.firstName, lastName: studentForm.lastName, department: studentForm.department, semester: studentForm.semester, phoneNumber: studentForm.phoneNumber, address: studentForm.address, userType: "STUDENT", createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), } setUsers((prev) => [...prev, newUser]) showMessage("success", `Student created successfully! USN: ${newUser.userId}`) setStudentForm({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", usn: "", department: "", semester: "", phoneNumber: "", address: "", }) } catch (error) { showMessage("error", "Error creating student account") } finally { setLoading(false) } }, 1000) } const handleTeacherSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) setTimeout(() => { try { const newUser = { id: Date.now(), userId: generateId("TEACHER", teacherForm.department), email: teacherForm.email, firstName: teacherForm.firstName, lastName: teacherForm.lastName, department: teacherForm.department, designation: teacherForm.designation, specialization: teacherForm.specialization, phoneNumber: teacherForm.phoneNumber, userType: "TEACHER", createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), } setUsers((prev) => [...prev, newUser]) showMessage("success", `Teacher created successfully! Employee ID: ${newUser.userId}`) setTeacherForm({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", department: "", designation: "", specialization: "", phoneNumber: "", }) } catch (error) { showMessage("error", "Error creating teacher account") } finally { setLoading(false) } }, 1000) } const handleAdminSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) setTimeout(() => { try { const newUser = { id: Date.now(), userId: adminForm.email, email: adminForm.email, firstName: adminForm.firstName, lastName: adminForm.lastName, phoneNumber: adminForm.phoneNumber, userType: adminForm.adminType, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), } setUsers((prev) => [...prev, newUser]) showMessage("success", `Admin created successfully! Email: ${newUser.email}`) setAdminForm({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", phoneNumber: "", adminType: "FOOD_CART", }) } catch (error) { showMessage("error", "Error creating admin account") } finally { setLoading(false) } }, 1000) } const handleDeleteUser = (userId, userType) => { if (!window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete this ${userType.toLowerCase()}?`)) { return } setLoading(true) setTimeout(() => { try { setUsers((prev) => prev.filter((user) => user.userId !== userId)) showMessage("success", `${userType.toLowerCase()} deleted successfully!`) } catch (error) { showMessage("error", "Error deleting user") } finally { setLoading(false) } }, 500) } const filteredUsers = users.filter((user) => { switch (activeTab) { case "students": return user.userType === "STUDENT" case "teachers": return user.userType === "TEACHER" case "admins": return ["FOOD_CART", "CANTEEN", "STATIONERY"].includes(user.userType) default: return true } }) const getUserIcon = (userType) => { switch (userType) { case "STUDENT": return case "TEACHER": return case "FOOD_CART": return "üçï" case "CANTEEN": return "üçΩ" case "STATIONERY": return "üìö" default: return } } return (
{/* Header */}
DSCE

Department Admin Panel

Manage Users & Credentials

{/* Message Display */} {message.text && ( {message.text} )} Students Teachers Admin Users {/* Students Tab */}
{/* Add Student Form */} Add New Student
setStudentForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, firstName: e.target.value }))} className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="Enter first name" required />
setStudentForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, lastName: e.target.value }))} className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="Enter last name" required />
setStudentForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, email: e.target.value }))} className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="student@dsce.edu.in" required />
setStudentForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, password: e.target.value }))} className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="Set student password" required />
setStudentForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, usn: e.target.value.toUpperCase() }))} className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="e.g., 1DS21CS001" required />
setStudentForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, phoneNumber: e.target.value }))} className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="9876543210" />
